ADODB_ado.ADODB_ado (  ) 

ADODB_ado.ServerInfo (  ) 

Get server version info...

Returns:
An array with 2 elements: $arr['string'] is the description string, and $arr[version] is the version (also a string).

Reimplemented from ADOConnection.
